title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka's Homeless
description: Help us provide warm clothing to the homeless community in Dhaka city this winter.

title: Support Slum Areas in Dhaka
description: Provide winter clothing to families in Dhaka's underprivileged slum areas.

title: Winter Help for Khulna Orphans
description: Donate warm clothes to orphanages across Khulna.

description: Join us in supporting families in Sylhet's coldest villages.

description: Donate blankets to vulnerable families in Sylhet during this winter.

title: Chattogram Hill Tract Aid
description: Provide warm clothing to indigenous communities in Chattogram.

description: Support urban low-income families in Chattogram this winter.

title: Rajshahi Cold Relief Fund
description: Help provide warm clothing to families affected by extreme cold in Rajshahi.

description: Donate blankets for those in need across rural Rajshahi.

description: Support the elderly in Khulna with warm clothes and blankets this winter.
